subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka won his third straight decision and Manny Ramírez hit his 476th career home run last night as the Boston Red Sox handed the Toronto Blue Jays their eighth straight loss.
snippet: Daisuke Matsuzaka won his third straight decision and Manny Ramírez hit his 476th career home run last night as the Boston Red Sox handed the Toronto Blue Jays their eighth straight loss.
